snippet: Rival groups clashed over the decision by the Afghan president, Hamid Karzai, to change the name of a teacher-training university in the capital.
abstract: Protests in Kabul, Afghanistan, over decision to rename Kabul Education University to honor controversial political figure Burhanuddin Rabbani turn violent as supporters of the name change converge on protesters, pummeling them with stones.
lead_paragraph: Rival groups clashed over the decision by the Afghan president, Hamid Karzai, to change the name of a teacher-training university in the capital.

headline.seo: Clashes in Kabul Fight Over Name of College
headline.main: Discontent Over Renaming of Kabul College Turns Into Violence
headline.print_headline: Discontent Over Renaming of Kabul College Turns Into Violence
